content.prompt: Archaeologists believe that Nan Madol was ruled by a powerful dynasty during its cultural and economic peak based on oral histories and the

choices.label: introduction of mass-produced building materials from Europe
sophisticated engineering skill and labor resources required to construct the site
luxury burial goods and gold sarcophagi found in royal tombs
presence of imagery of divine rulership appropriated from Polynesia

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
